com.cardconnect.consumersdk

Interface CCConsumerApiBridge


  • public interface CCConsumerApiBridge
    Describes communication protocol defined between third party developer and Sdk custom UI checkout process.
    In order to use checkout with predefined flow and custom user interface consumer | developer must provide and implementation of this class which contains the data in CCConsumerApiBridge methods. This information will be accessed from within the internal flow.
    e.g:
    Create a concrete implementation of CCConsumerApiBridge that returns all available accounts: 
     {@code

   CCConsumerApiBridge userObject = new CustomCCConsumerApiBridge(){

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void deleteCustomerAccount(CCConsumerAccount account, CCConsumerApiBridgeCallbacks callbacks)
      Deletes an account from a specific customer.
      void getAccounts(CCConsumerApiBridgeCallbacks callbacks)
      Gets account(s) provided by Consumer.
      void saveAccountToCustomer(CCConsumerAccount account, CCConsumerApiBridgeCallbacks callbacks)
      Save an account to a specific customer.
      void updateAccount(CCConsumerAccount account, CCConsumerApiBridgeCallbacks callbacks)
      Update an account from a specific customer.

    • Method Detail

      • getAccounts

        void getAccounts(@NonNull
                 CCConsumerApiBridgeCallbacks callbacks)
        Gets account(s) provided by Consumer.

        Results will be accessed by internal checkout process from CCConsumerApiBridgeCallbacks.onApiResponse(CCConsumerApiBridgeResponse)
        Results should be populated by the implementer in a CCConsumerApiBridgeGetAccountsResponse object.

        Parameters:
        callbacks - CCConsumerApiBridgeCallbacks event handler triggered by the implementer when the result is received.

      • saveAccountToCustomer

        void saveAccountToCustomer(@NonNull
                           CCConsumerAccount account,
                           @NonNull
                           CCConsumerApiBridgeCallbacks callbacks)
        Save an account to a specific customer.

        Results will be accessed by internal checkout process from CCConsumerApiBridgeCallbacks.onApiResponse(CCConsumerApiBridgeResponse)
        Results should be populated by the implementer on a CCConsumerApiBridgeSaveAccountResponse object.

        Parameters:
        account - Updated account to save by the implementer.
        callbacks - CCConsumerApiBridgeCallbacks event handler invoked by implementer when the result is received.

      • deleteCustomerAccount

        void deleteCustomerAccount(@NonNull
                           CCConsumerAccount account,
                           @NonNull
                           CCConsumerApiBridgeCallbacks callbacks)
        Deletes an account from a specific customer.

        Results will be accessed by internal checkout process from CCConsumerApiBridgeCallbacks.onApiResponse(CCConsumerApiBridgeResponse)
        Results should be populated by the implementer on a CCConsumerApiBridgeDeleteAccountResponse object.

        Parameters:
        account - Account selected for deleting by the implementer.
        callbacks - CCConsumerApiBridgeCallbacks callback event handler invoked by implementer when the result is received.

      • updateAccount

        void updateAccount(@NonNull
                   CCConsumerAccount account,
                   @NonNull
                   CCConsumerApiBridgeCallbacks callbacks)
        Update an account from a specific customer.

        Results will be accessed by internal checkout process from CCConsumerApiBridgeCallbacks.onApiResponse(CCConsumerApiBridgeResponse)
        Results should be populated by the implementer on a CCConsumerApiBridgeUpdateAccountResponse object.

        Parameters:
        account - Account selected for updating by the implementer.
        callbacks - CCConsumerApiBridgeCallbacks callback event handler invoked by implementer when the result is received.
